# problem 1
```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("hw2_datasets/pols-month.csv") |> 
  mutate(year = year(mon), month = month(mon), day = day(mon),
         case_match(
          month,
          1 ~ "January",
          2 ~ "February",
          3 ~ "March",
          4 ~ "April",
          5 ~ "May",
          6 ~ "June",
          7 ~ "July",
          8 ~ "August",
          9 ~ "September",
          10 ~ "October",
          11 ~ "November",
          12 ~ "December"))
    
  
```
